meanings.definition: The surgical removal of one or both adrenal glands.
meanings.sent1: Adrenalectomies are surgeries to take out adrenal glands.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed two adrenalectomies last week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the adrenal glands go on vacation? To avoid adrenalectomies!
meanings.sent4: After the adrenalectomies, she felt like a weight had been lifted off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The adrenalectomies were like saying goodbye to stress forever.

meanings.definition: The procedure of excising the adrenal glands.
meanings.sent1: During the adrenalectomies, the surgeon carefully removed the adrenal glands.
meanings.sent2: He studied the adrenalectomies in medical school.
meanings.sent3: Why did the adrenal glands break up? They couldn't handle adrenalectomies!
meanings.sent4: The adrenalectomies were a necessary step towards better health.
meanings.sent5: The adrenalectomies were a life-changing event for the patient.
